New_Britain.WTIC-TV: WTIC-TV, virtual channel 61 (UHF digital channel 31), is a television station licensed to Hartford, Connecticut and is the Fox affiliate for the Hartford–New Haven, Connecticut television market. WTIC is owned by Tribune Broadcasting as part of a duopoly with Waterbury, Connecticut-licensed CW affiliate, WCCT-TV (channel 20}. The two stations share facilities with the formerly co-owned Hartford Courant newspaper in downtown Hartford.
